医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
“睡眠离婚”趋势反映了人们对睡眠和人际关系态度的变化根据美国睡眠医学会 2024 年进行的一项调查，29% 的美国人选择睡在同一间卧室或家中不同空间的另一张床上，以更好地满足伴侣的睡眠需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Sleep-divorce-trend-reflects-changing-attitudes-toward-sleep-and-relationships.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Sleep-divorce-trend-reflects-changing-attitudes-toward-sleep-and-relationships.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=857f10d9-b761-47bb-af22-36a54b372926 Thu, 18 Jul 2024 04:57:00 -0400 'Sleep divorce' trend reflects changing attitudes toward sleep and relationships
正念训练与意识状态改变有关剑桥大学研究人员的一项新研究表明，正念训练可能会让参与者体验到脱离身体和统一，即所谓的意识状态改变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Mindativity-training-linked-to-altered-states-of-意识.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Mindativity-training-linked-to-altered-states-of-thought.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d81fb1b0-bab9-40b9-ba74-ec1150c8c2eb Thu, 18 Jul 2024 02:53:25 -0400 Mindfulness training linked to altered states of consciousness
科罗拉多大学博尔德分校的研究揭示了内源性逆转录病毒在癌症中的作用窥视人类基因组内部，在作为生命构建模块的大约 20,000 个基因中，您还会发现几千万年前感染灵长类祖先的病毒留下的 DNA 斑点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/CU-Boulder-research-uncovers-role-of-endogenous-retroviruses-in-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/CU-Boulder-research-uncovers-role-of-endogenous-retroviruses-in-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6386a8f4-3877-4e93-ad96-470bfe2719dd Thu, 18 Jul 2024 02:40:57 -0400 CU Boulder research uncovers role of endogenous retroviruses in cancer
研究：患有严重子宫内膜异位症的女性患卵巢癌的可能性高出10倍犹他大学亨茨曼癌症研究所、犹他大学 Spencer Fox Eccles 医学院和波士顿大学 Chobanian & Avedisian 医学院的研究人员进行的一项具有里程碑意义的研究发现，女性患有严重子宫内膜异位症的可能性高出 10 倍与未患卵巢癌的女性相比。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Study-Women-with-severe-endometriosis-10-times-more-likely-to-get-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Study-Women-with-severe-endometriosis-10-times-more-likely-to-get-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae27679b-8b00-4dde-90cb-b651a8633cda Thu, 18 Jul 2024 02:28:34 -0400 Study: Women with severe endometriosis 10 times more likely to get ovarian cancer
妊娠早期接触 COVID-19 和接种疫苗与严重出生缺陷无关《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项来自斯堪的纳维亚半岛的研究发现，怀孕前三个月的 covid-19 感染或疫苗接种均不会增加重大出生缺陷的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/First-trimester-COVID-19-exposure-and-vaccination-not-tied-to-major-birth-defects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/First-trimester-COVID-19-exposure-and-vaccination-not-tied-to-major-birth-defects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e62ba1f3-5c53-44a2-874c-bafce22f91a8 Thu, 18 Jul 2024 02:18:34 -0400 First trimester COVID-19 exposure and vaccination not tied to major birth defects
研究发现，英国成年人长期吸电子烟的人数急剧上升《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项研究发现，英国报告吸电子烟时间超过六个月的成年人数量已从 2013 年的大约十分之一大幅增加到 2023 年的十分之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Sharp-rise-in-long-term-vaping-among-adults-in-England-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Sharp-rise-in-long-term-vaping-among-adults-in-England-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=633a5748-7c61-4219-957e-016da94b4a00 Thu, 18 Jul 2024 02:12:16 -0400 Sharp rise in long-term vaping among adults in England, study finds
急性胃肠炎与肠易激综合征和功能性消化不良的发病率较高有关研究人员检查了急性胃肠炎后感染后肠易激综合征和感染后功能性消化不良的患病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Acute-gastroenteritis-linked-to-higher-rates-of-irritable-bowel-syndrome-and-function-dyspepsia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Acute-gastroenteritis-linked-to-higher-rates-of-irritable-bowel-syndrome-and-function-dyspepsia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=836eb55f-8f50-44f2-8cb8-5b7c4e34b598 Thu, 18 Jul 2024 01:48:00 -0400 Acute gastroenteritis linked to higher rates of irritable bowel syndrome and functional dyspepsia
关于运动如何发挥抗抑郁作用的新见解伦敦大学学院的研究人员提出了一种新的框架，通过运动减轻炎症和增强多巴胺的传输，从而缓解抑郁症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Novel-insights-into-how-exercise-functions-as-an-antidepressant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Novel-insights-into-how-exercise-functions-as-an-antidepressant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1298420-4bbb-4921-8104-ec92dc6b8986 Thu, 18 Jul 2024 01:00:00 -0400 Novel insights into how exercise functions as an antidepressant
数学模型揭示了历史海上航行中蒸汽旅行如何加剧全球病原体风险研究人员利用数学模型来研究历史上船载病原体风险，发现蒸汽旅行和大规模人员流动显着增加了跨洋病原体循环。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Mathematical-models-reveal-how-steam-travel-escalated-global-pathogen-risks-during-historical-sea-voyages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Mathematical-models-reveal-how-steam-travel-escalated-global-pathogen-risks-during-historical-sea-voyages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ff62dc7-3190-4a86-bfda-8a179914fd30 Thu, 18 Jul 2024 00:32:00 -0400 Mathematical models reveal how steam travel escalated global pathogen risks during historical sea voyages
研究发现昼夜节律紊乱与肥胖和糖尿病有关昼夜节律和时钟基因表达的破坏与不良的代谢健康结果有关，包括肥胖和糖尿病。需要进一步的研究来了解这些关系及其对治疗和预防的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Study-links-circadian-rhythm-disruption-to-obesity-and-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Study-links-circadian-rhythm-disruption-to-obesity-and-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72bb74a0-afdb-4acf-a6a5-74b9ebb16a08 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 23:50:00 -0400 Study links circadian rhythm disruption to obesity and diabetes
